ai-iti56:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti56:2.3_0: The defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-iti56:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti56:4.2_0: and the path that leads to their ending.
ai-iti56:4.3_0: With the ending of defilements, a mendicant
ai-iti56:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
